==============
LAST CHANGES :
==============

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes in FCK.Plone 2.6.2 :
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Includes FCKeditor 2.6.2 version (see docs/_whatsnew.html)

2. Includes flvPlayer plugin

3. Changes in connectorPlone, fckconfig.js, fck_plone.js to play with FCKConfig.MediaBrowser options (used by flvPlayer)

4. base2zope changed : now includes htc files in skin as htc.pt

5. Remove resolveUid links for Medias insertion (redirection do not work with mediaplayer.swf)
